title.durnotify.new_ver: A wild new version of DurNotify appeared! Download it from Modrinth! %s
config.durnotify.warn_max_under_50: When max durability is less than 50
config.durnotify.warn_max_under_100: When max durability is less than 100
config.durnotify.warn_max_under_200: When max durability is less than 200
config.durnotify.warn_max_above_200: When max durability is higher than 200
tooltip.durnotify.warn_message: This message is sent when the durability of a weapon or tool is low.
tooltip.durnotify.warn_armor_message: This message is sent when the durability of a armor is low.
tooltip.durnotify.warn_into_actionbar.li: Toggles whether or not to send a warning message under the cross-hairs.
If the value is No, a warning message is sent to the chat.
tooltip.durnotify.warn_max_under_50: The trigger durability when max durability is less than 50
tooltip.durnotify.warn_max_under_100: The trigger durability when max durability is less than 100
tooltip.durnotify.warn_max_under_200: The trigger durability when max durability is less than 200
tooltip.durnotify.warn_max_above_200: The trigger durability when max durability is higher than 200
